feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:26 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 10:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 70 %
Dewpoint: -26.8°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 70 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight with 70 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
